hero.description: Transform your farming with affordable soil monitoring, smart irrigation, and AI-powered guidance. Join the agricultural revolution in Africa.

problem.title: The Problem We're Solving
problem.subtitle: Farmers across Africa face critical challenges that threaten food security and livelihoods
problem.decliningSoilFertilityDesc: Continuous farming without proper soil management leads to nutrient depletion and reduced productivity.
problem.poorIrrigationDesc: Inefficient water usage and lack of proper irrigation systems result in crop stress and water waste.
problem.limitedGuidanceDesc: Traditional methods rely on guesswork, lacking access to data-driven insights and expert advice.
problem.climateChange: Climate change is making these challenges worse
problem.climateChangeDesc: Without smart solutions, soil degradation and low productivity will continue to harm livelihoods and local economies, leaving communities vulnerable and threatening food security.

whyChooseUs.title: Why choose us?
whyChooseUs.description1: Soilsmart began with a simple idea: what if the soil itself could guide the farmer?
whyChooseUs.description2: We saw the immense economic and community burden created billowed to make soil health visible, actionable, and accessible — even next knowledge.
whyChooseUs.description3: From local hubs to global partnerships, we're building tools that empower smallholder farmers to save water, grow more, and protect their land for the next generation.
whyChooseUs.sustainabilityDesc: We bring the long-term health and resource balance
whyChooseUs.communityDesc: Farmers' trust, and local guardians working hand in hand
whyChooseUs.innovationDesc: Simple UI and sensor tech that works offline, anywhere

objectives.title: SoilSmart Objectives
objectives.subtitle: Closing the gap with affordable, data-driven tools for sustainable and effective soil management
objectives.automateDeliveryDesc: Smart automation for water and compost delivery.
objectives.mobileAppDesc: Access all features on-the-go with offline support.

features.title: Explore our wide range of services
features.soilTestingDesc: Get comprehensive soil analysis with our advanced testing technology to optimize your farming.

features.sustainableFarmingDesc: Eco-friendly farming practices that protect the environment and increase productivity.
features.readyToTransform: Ready to transform your farming with our comprehensive services?

howItWorks.title: How SoilSmart Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in four simple steps and transform your farming practices
howItWorks.step1Desc: Create your account and install affordable IoT sensors in your farm fields.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Set up your farm profile, crop types, and irrigation preferences in the app.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Track real-time data, receive AI recommendations, and automate irrigation.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Enjoy increased yields, reduced costs, and sustainable farming practices.
